featureData.title: Data at your fingertips
featureData.copy: Customer context in a single view. Purchases, billing, previous interactions - anything you need. Reduce time navigating administrative tools so you can focus on communicating with the customer.

featurePrivacy.title: Ensure privacy complaince
featurePrivacy.copy: Decide what data each support team member gets to see and which actions are available to them. Ensure GDPR privacy compliance with data auditing capability.

trialText: 14 day free trial. No credit card required.

featureMagicActions.title: Magic Actions
featureMagicActions.copy: Automate repetitive workflows without code. Stop wasting time with manual data entry and Google Sheets. Perform tasks automatically instead.

featureAnalytics.title: Be Data Driven
featureAnalytics.copy: Track actions taken and answer simple questions like how many refunds were given this week. Use data to help improve internal policies.

customers.title: Powering support for thousands of customers across the world

subtitle: See customer context and automate repetitive workflows to stay in control when ticket volumes grow.

featureTimeline.title: Continuity between interactions
featureTimeline.copy: See every action taken. Easily add and read through notes from teammates for seamless interactions with customers.

title: Mission Control For Growing Support Teams
